subject: Test Data Provider
msgSnippet: Hi all, I m in a situation where I need to feed my tests (various tests) with same type of data (think about a legacy EDI message). After hardcoding the test
messageBody:
Hi all,

I'm in a situation where I need to feed my tests (various tests) with
same type of data (think about a legacy EDI message). After hardcoding
the test data twice, now I would like to centralize the test data
management (refactoring right? :-). I'm creating a TestDataProvider
interface and a factory. Then I can implement the factory however I
want: getting the test data from an XML file, database, randomly or in
sequence etc. Obviously the data has to include the successful
response too.

My question is: Am I reinventing the wheel or is there a framework
that provides this already?

Cheers,

- Yagiz Erkan -
http://yagiz.blogspot.com
http://www.erkans.com
